abstract: PepsiCo, the U.S. soft drinks maker, won European Union regulatory approval Tuesday to buy bottlers Pepsi Bottling Group and PepsiAmericas, deals that will help it cut costs and boost profits.
snippet: PepsiCo, the U.S. soft drinks maker, won European Union regulatory approval Tuesday to buy bottlers Pepsi Bottling Group and PepsiAmericas, deals that will help it cut costs and boost profits.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo won European Union regulatory approval on Tuesday to buy bottlers Pepsi Bottling Group and PepsiAmericas, deals that will help it cut costs and increase profits.

headline.main: PepsiCo Gets E.U. Approval to Buy 2 Bottlers
